about_the_game:
We will add 13 officer graphics, chosen out of the officers that appear in the drama "Three Kingdoms."

▼Additional Officer Graphics
Zhuge Liang / Zhao Yun / Liu Bei / Guan Yu / Pang Tong / Wei Yan / Zhang Fei / Ma Chao / Jiang Wei / Huang Zhong / Xu Shu / Liu Chan / Ma Su

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select the officer whose face you would like to change. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the appropriate graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
